elements.name: Admin first goes to Trendlifebuy Admin Dashboard homepage.

steps.name: Go to "myUrl" page.
Enter a valid "Email" address and "Password" in the relevant fields on the page that opens, then click the SIGN IN button.
Then a message about successful login should appear in a green box in the upper right corner of the screen.
The Products Title should be clickable under the PRODUCT MANAGE title on the left side of the screen on the Dashboard page.
Click on the link button titled Product Lists from the options listed under the Products Title.

elements.name: TC_3413 Verify that Product Information, Price Info And Stock, Weight Height Info, Product Image Info, Pdf Specifications, Product Video Info, Others Info information is changeable on Clone Product page

steps.name: Click on any Select button opposite the products under the Action heading column.
Click the Clone Link button.
Click the Variant checkbox under the Product Information heading, then click the Single checkbox again to select it.
Type "Exclusive Leather Bag" in the NAME text box and "ex-bag-2" in the PRODUCT SKU text box.
Type "Woman Bag" in the SUBTITLE1 text box and "bg-001" in the MODEL NUMBER text box.
Click on the CATEGORY text box, click on the Bags option in the mini pop-up box that appears.
Click on the box under the BRAND title and select the OzVittoria brand from the options.
Click on the box under the UNIT heading and click on the LOT option from the options that appear.
Click on the box under the BARCODE TYPE title and click on any of the options that appear.
Type "1" in the text box under the MINIMUM ORDER QTY title and "12" in the MAX ORDER QTY text box.
Type "woman bags" in the text box under Tags (Comma Separated).
Click the Browse button under Product Image Info and click the Upload New button from the pop-up window.
Upload an image file from your computer by clicking the Browse files link and click the Done button.
Then click on the 'Sort by newest' option from the sorting options in the window that opens and select an image.
Click the Select Only checkbox and click the Add Files button and save the file.
Upload a PDF file from your computer by clicking the Browse button in the Upload PDF section under PDF SPECIFICATIONS.
Select Youtube from the VIDEO PROVIDER box under the heading Product Video Information and print a "Youtube link" in the VIDEO LINK text box.
Check that the STATUS and MAKE DISPLAY IN DETAILS PAGE selected information under Others Info can be changed.
Check that the selected and written information under the Weight Height Info heading can be changed.
Write a description about the product in the text boxes under the headings Description and Specifications.
Type a title and description in the META TITLE and META DESCRIPTION text boxes under SEO info.
Then click the Save button at the bottom of the page and check that the information has been successfully saved.

elements.name: Admin first goes to Trendlifebuy Admin Dashboard homepage.

steps.name: Go to "myUrl" page.
Enter a valid "Email" address and "Password" in the relevant fields on the page that opens, then click the SIGN IN button.
Then a message about successful login should appear in a green box in the upper right corner of the screen.
The Products Title should be clickable under the PRODUCT MANAGE title on the left side of the screen on the Dashboard page.
Click on the link button titled Product Lists from the options listed under the Products Title.

elements.name: TC_3414 On the Save button, it should be verified that the message reminding that the information on the Related Product, Up Sale, Cross Sale pages must be filled before registration is visible.

steps.name: Click on any Select button opposite the products under the Action heading column.
Click the Clone Link button.
With the GENERAL INFORMATION window tab selected, verify that the message reminding that the information must be filled before recording is displayed at the end of the page.
Click on the RELATED PRODUCT tab, verify that the Related Product window appears at the end of the page reminding you to fill in the information before recording.
Click on the UP SALE tab, verify that the Up Sale window appears at the end of the page, reminding that the information must be filled before registration.
Click on the CROSS SALE tab, verify that the Cross sale window appears at the end of the page, reminding that the information must be filled before registration.

name: US_034 As an administrator, I want the Product List page to be able to access the product lists on the site.
